translations: 蜕下的皮（或壳）；绝境；[地理] 泥沼；[外科] 腐肉
蜕皮；脱落；在泥浆中跋涉

sentences.sentence: Our bodies slough off dead cells.
sentences.translation: 我们的身体会自然脱掉死细胞

sentences.sentence: He was sinking into the Slough of Despond.
sentences.translation: 他那时正陷入极度沮丧的状态。

sentences.sentence: All reptiles have to slough their skin to grow.
sentences.translation: 所有爬行动物都必须自然脱皮才能成长
